column5: Chatting with my buddy Colin the other night when the topic of our first "backcountry" canoe trip came up After so many laughs I thought - this is a post that I need to write I am not sure which of us coined the title "The Citiots Take Algonquin Park" but since I wrote it and its my site I am taking credit lol Here is the link https://www.northernjacks.com/post/the-citiots-take-algonquin-park Cheers Andrew
Great read, looks like it was a great time.  Love the part about “do you want to get paid“.
Thanks for the feedback and glad you enjoyed it!  His demeanor shifted a bit when the do you want to get paid got thrown out there lol
